name: Contamination Control Strategy MasterClass
content: Contamination Control Strategy Online training will present you what is meant by “Contamination Control Strategy”? It is a complex system of measures designed to minimize the risk of contamination in the manufacture of pharmaceuticals. A strategy to implement the necessary control measures, such as monitoring of rooms, surfaces and personnel, in order to record and evaluate the respective condition is therefore urgently needed. #masterclass #glceurope #pharmaonlinetraining #globalleadingconferences #contaminationcontrolstrategy
